greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Real part of the sum of divisors function sigma(n) generalized for Gaussian integers.
comment: See A103229 for the imaginary part and A103230 for the norm.
See A102506 for a complete description. Note that sigma(n) is real iff n is in A004614.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Jan 26 2005
